pkgmetadata.longdescription: Companion Package for the Book "Data Integration, Manipulation and Visualization of Phylogenetic Trees" by Guangchuang Yu (2022, ISBN:9781032233574) // The companion package that provides all the datasets used in the book "Data Integration, Manipulation and Visualization of Phylogenetic Trees" by Guangchuang Yu (2022, ISBN:9781032233574).
